EmailTemplate.name: 10-08-21 BNK Accelerate Magazine Pre Event.PRE EVENT Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit NCR at JAC|SEC 2021 - Gain expert insights on digital transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly: This year’s JAC|SEC virtual event is locked and loaded with expert insights on how to max out returns on your digital transformation strategy. And with the latest issue of 'Accelerate', NCR’s digital-first magazine, you’ll get a jump on the conversation. Read about the future of cryptocurrency and what financial institutions need to know now. Learn how NCR and Google Cloud are using data to tackle the toughest challenges in banking. And find out what’s next for AI and conversational banking. It’s all about the future of digital-first finance. P.S Don’t forget to stop by and see us virtually at JAC|SEC 2021! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
